string-array.name: Anxiety Questions
string-array.item: Have you been feeling restless like you are unable to sit in one place?
Have you been concerned about more than one thing?
Have you been agitated or tensed?
Have you had trouble staying calm?
Have you struggled to control feelings of anxiety, agitation or fear?
Have you felt ill tempered or moody?
Have you panicked about things that might happen to you or the ones closed to you?
Have you been having any irrational fears, from certain things?

string-array.name: Schitz Questions
string-array.item: Other people unable to see and hear things that I can
Sometimes I are unable to speak
It is tough for me to organize and start working on anything
I believe i have powers that others don't
Sometimes words don't come out as i intent
I can hear conversations that others can't
I can hear other people taking about me
I feel people are going to harm me
I sometimes completely lack emotions
I believe that someone can take charge of my body completely
Sometimes i am unable to tell if i am having hallucinations
I can tell whats going on before it happens
I believe that i can read other people's minds
Due to these things i am unable to perform daily functions

string-array.name: Depression Questions
string-array.item: Have you been having the feeling that you will never find joy in life?
Have you been having problems focusing on daily task?
Have you been feeling lethargic or have no energy?
Have you been eating too little for the past few weeks?
Have you been moving less than usual?
Have you been struggling to get sleep ?
Have you been overly harsh on yourself?
Have you been feeling low?
Have you been feeling suicidal or wanting to harm yourself?
